name: Lost Devil
description:
Awake and unfamiliar with an incomplete body
Help Jammo find and upgrade himself to find out what happen.

Game feature:
Exploring other dimension to seek change to upgrade, to find down the true.
Gradually upgrade run, jump, fly
Explore snow-capped forests, fields of flowers, storm zones and the grave
Fight with vampires and defeat them,
Find out where you want to go and make your own choices, making a real choice without you having a chance to turn around
